name: Pirateland
description:
Multiplayer
With multiplayer, you can design your ship and participate in pirate wars and manage the missions on the island with your pirate team.
If you wish, one of your friends can be the gunner of your ship and your other friend can repair the ship and you may be managing the ship, but be careful, you are not alone in these dark waters.

Map
You can dive into the seas as you wish and explore underwater. You should also be careful with the tropical animals on the island.

Coop
With the coop mode in the game, you can complete 12 missions with your pirate comrades and experience a unique adventure.

Open World
While completing the missions in piratenland, you can explore the surroundings and travel to the island while you want. the variety and size of the game's map is great

Feedback
You can send us your feedback and suggestions about the game.
